titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the William John James Trustee and Financial Records, 1870 - 1939

Wesleyan University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: William John James Trustee and Financial Records, 1870 - 1939
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: William John James (1860-1941) was College Librarian from 1891 to 1929 and Assistant Treasurer of Wesleyan from 1908 to 1929.

The William John James Trustee and Financial Records concern financial matters brought before the Board of Trustees. Notable subject groupings for these dates include Buildings and Grounds and the Carnegie Foundation accreditations. These records are not a complete collection of Trustee business, but complement other Trustees' holdings in the Wesleyan University Archives.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], William John James Trustee and Financial Records, Collection #1979-1, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred to the Archives in 1979 from the office of Robert Taylor, University Treasurer.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: William John James (1860-1941) was College Librarian from 1891 to 1929 and Assistant Treasurer of Wesleyan from 1908 to 1929.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The William John James Trustee and Financial Records concern financial matters brought before the Board of Trustees. Notable subject groupings for these dates include Buildings and Grounds and the Carnegie Foundation accreditations. These records are not a complete collection of Trustee business, but complement other Trustees' holdings in the Wesleyan University Archives.

According to a June 19, 1918 memo from Secretary of the Board David Downey, James was responsible for holding important Trustee documents. Most of the James administrative papers are marked copy or have been copied, many of annotations. Several documents in this collection are not represented in other Trustee collections.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: James organized his collection by either year or by subject. This arrangement has been maintained. Year listings correspond with the date ending the academic year in question.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.corpname: Wesleyan University (Middletown, Conn.). Board of Trustees.
Carnegie Foundation for the Advancement of Teaching.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Board of Trustees Records, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University
